CrossValidationPrep<T>
public class CrossValidationPrepImpl<T extends LabelableItem>
extends java.lang.Object
implements CrossValidationPrep<T>

Provides stratification and randomization for use before cross validation.

 void randomize(java.util.List<T> instances)
          Shuffles the segments in the set so that they are ordered randomly.

          Stratifies a set of instances according to its class values if the class attribute is nominal (so that afterwards a stratified cross-validation can be performed).

stratify

public java.util.List<T> stratify(java.util.List<T> instances,
                                  int numFolds)
Stratifies a set of instances according to its class values if the class attribute is nominal (so that afterwards a stratified cross-validation can be performed).

Specified by:

Parameters:

numFolds - the number of folds in the cross-validation
